name: Plague
lore: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs

name: Hawkeye
lore: Condense Arrow Storm into a tight beam. Arrows deal ✣ 10%, ✦ 1%, and ❋ 1%

name: Greed
lore: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 15% max health

name: Cavalryman
lore: You may cast spells and attack with a -70% damage penalty while on a horse

name: Guardian
lore: 20% of damage taken by nearby allies is redirected to you

name: Heart of the Pack
lore: Nearby players gain 35% of the health you naturally regenerate

name: Saviour's Sacrifice
lore: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 30% bonus damage and defence

name: Transcendence
lore: 30% chance for spells to cost no mana when casted

name: Entropy
lore: Meteor falls three times faster

name: Roving Assassin
lore: Vanish will no longer block mana and health regeneration

name: Magnet
lore: Pulls items dropped by mobs towards you

name: Madness
lore: Casts a random spell of your class every 3 seconds

name: Lightweight
lore: You no longer take fall damage

name: Sorcery
lore: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost

name: Taunt
lore: Mobs within 12 blocks target you upon casting War Scream

name: Freerunner
lore: When your sprint bar is under 30% full, increase your sprint speed by +150%

name: Rally
lore: Charge heals you by 10% and nearby allies by 15% on impact, but becomes harmless

name: Cherry Bombs
lore: Your Smoke Bombs explode instantly, and increases their Neutral Damage by +90%

name: Peaceful Effigy
lore: Your Totem will last twice as long

name: Furious Effigy
lore: Totem effects are twice as fast, but duration is halved

name: Flash Freeze
lore: Ice Snake is instant and freezes for +1s

name: Fission
lore: Explosions from your "Exploding" ID are twice as big and twice as strong

name: Explosive Impact
lore: Your "Exploding" ID can trigger when hitting mobs with your Main Attack

name: Geocentrism
lore: Aura radiates from you instead of your Totem and can be cast any time

name: Gravity Well
lore: Meteor has increased blast radius and pulls enemies instead

name: Snowy Steps
lore: Leaves a trail of snow behind you

name: Festive Spirit
lore: Plays wintery tunes
